name: Movement & Motivation
description: A set of cards with various exercises and activities to help motivate and inspire, as well as provide some ideas for movement.

cards.title: Quick Squats
cards.description: Basic squats to strengthen legs and core
cards.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower body as if sitting, return to start

cards.title: Office Desk Stretches
cards.description: Simple stretches to combat sitting fatigue
cards.instructions: Perform neck rolls, shoulder shrugs, wrist rotations, and ankle circles

cards.title: Power Plank
cards.instructions: Hold plank position, alternate lifting each arm and leg for stability

cards.title: Quick Cardio Burst
cards.description: Rapid cardio session to boost heart rate
cards.instructions: Alternate 30 seconds each of jumping jacks, high knees, and mountain climbers

cards.title: Mindful Breathing
cards.description: Focused breathing exercise for stress relief
cards.instructions: Sit comfortably, practice 4-7-8 breathing pattern

cards.title: HIIT Blast
cards.description: High-intensity interval training for full body
cards.instructions: Cycle through burpees, push-ups, squats, and lunges with 30-second intervals

cards.title: Basic Yoga Flow
cards.instructions: Flow through sun salutation poses, hold each for 5 breaths

cards.title: Core Crusher
cards.instructions: Perform planks, crunches, leg raises, and Russian twists

cards.title: Resistance Band Workout
cards.instructions: Target arms, legs, and back using resistance band exercises

cards.title: Mobility Flow
cards.instructions: Dynamic stretches for major joints and muscle groups

cards.title: Strength Circuit
cards.instructions: Circuit of push-ups, squats, rows, lunges, and core exercises

cards.title: Pilates Core
cards.instructions: Series of controlled movements targeting deep core muscles

cards.title: Cardio Blast
cards.instructions: Mix of jumping jacks, burpees, mountain climbers, and high knees

cards.title: Stretch and Restore
cards.instructions: Progressive stretching sequence for all major muscle groups

cards.title: Bodyweight Burn
cards.instructions: Combination of squats, push-ups, dips, and core exercises

cards.title: Box Breathing
cards.description: Navy SEAL breathing technique for stress management
cards.instructions: Inhale 4 counts, hold 4, exhale 4, hold 4, repeat

cards.title: Alternate Nostril Breathing
cards.description: Balancing breath work from yoga tradition
cards.instructions: Alternate breathing through left and right nostrils using thumb and ring finger

cards.title: Diaphragmatic Breathing
cards.instructions: Lie down, hand on belly, breathe deeply into diaphragm

cards.title: Coherent Breathing
cards.description: Five breaths per minute for autonomic balance
cards.instructions: Inhale 6 seconds, exhale 6 seconds, maintain rhythm

cards.title: Morning Wake-Up Sequence
cards.instructions: Progressive stretches from neck to toes, starting in bed

cards.title: Joint Mobility Flow
cards.description: Dynamic stretching for all major joints
cards.instructions: Circular movements for each joint, progressing head to toe

cards.title: Posterior Chain Release
cards.description: Focus on back, hamstrings, and calves
cards.instructions: Series of forward folds and gentle back bends

cards.title: Mindful Steps
cards.instructions: Walk slowly, focus on sensation of each step

cards.title: Gratitude Walk
cards.instructions: Walk naturally, mentally note things you're grateful for

cards.title: Breath-Synchronized Walking
cards.instructions: Match breath to steps, 4 steps inhale, 4 steps exhale

cards.title: Goal Visualization
cards.description: Mental rehearsal of achieving specific goals
cards.instructions: Visualize your goal in detail, including actions and emotions

cards.title: Success Journaling
cards.instructions: Write three recent successes and analyze what led to them

cards.title: Obstacle Planning
cards.description: Identify and plan around potential barriers
cards.instructions: List obstacles, brainstorm solutions, create action steps

cards.title: Achievement Meditation
cards.description: Focus on past successes and future goals
cards.instructions: Meditate on recent wins and visualize upcoming achievements

cards.title: Progress Review
cards.description: Structured review of goals and milestones
cards.instructions: Evaluate progress, adjust strategies, plan next steps

cards.title: Power Posing
cards.instructions: Hold expansive poses while practicing positive self-talk

cards.title: Energy Breathing
cards.instructions: Practice rapid inhales and controlled exhales

cards.title: Quick Activation
cards.instructions: Combine jumping jacks with motivational phrases

cards.title: Mental Energizer
cards.instructions: Solve quick puzzles while moving or stretching

cards.title: Rhythm Boost
cards.instructions: Dance or move to upbeat music with deep breathing

cards.title: Object Focus
cards.instructions: Focus on one object, notice details, maintain attention

cards.title: Mindful Counting
cards.instructions: Count breaths or objects while maintaining focus

cards.title: Task Chunking
cards.description: Break down and focus on single tasks
cards.instructions: Select task, divide into parts, focus on one segment

cards.title: Sensory Awareness
cards.instructions: Cycle through noticing sounds, sensations, and sights

cards.title: Flow State Practice
cards.instructions: Choose challenging task, eliminate distractions, maintain focus
